nodes.text: The Pius Dea's Supreme Temple on Coruscant was the sect's largest temple. It was built sometime during the Pius Dea Crusades when the sect ruled the Galactic Republic as a theocracy. Following the collapse of Pius Dea rule during the Seventh Alsakan Conflict and the capture of the last Pius Dea Supreme Chancellor Contispex XIX, the Supreme Temple was destroyed after an anti-Pius Dea coalition led by the Jedi Order on Ossus took over the Republic and its institutions.
